actions.message: We find two of our heroes on the second floor, staring blankly to the right, doing nothing.
Realizing they are doing nothing, and no one else is around to help them do even more nothing, they decide to leave Perkins and go somewhere INFINITELY BETTER,
like the Main Green or Keeney.
Let’s say Keeney. Keeney’s a pretty chill place.
(TIP: Use the W/A/S/D keys or the Directional keys to move the Perkinites around!)
